issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
The {{adBackgroundColor}} property has no effect in ti.admob iOS version. Banner Ads always appear with black background regardless of whatever color you set using this property.

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Create new Titanium app.
2. Download ti.admob module.
3. Copy the example app.js code in index.js and change {{adBackgroundColor}} to red (or whatever else)
4. Run on iOS simulator or device.

*Expected Result:*
Ad background should be appear as passed while creating ad view.

*Actual Result:*
Empty background space on ad view is always black.
fields.summary: Admob module iOS version doesn't honor adBackgroundColor
